00023 #include <Raffiner_anisotrope.h>
00024 #include <Scatter.h>
00025 
00026 Implemente_instanciable(Raffiner_anisotrope,"Raffiner_anisotrope",Interprete_geometrique_base);

00030   return Interprete::printOn(os);

00037 
00038 Entree& Raffiner_anisotrope::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00039 {
00040   if (dimension == 2)
00041     {
00042       Cerr << "Refinement of each element into 3 new triangles... " <<finl;
00043     }
00044   else if (dimension == 3)
00045     {
00046       Cerr << "Refinement of each element into 4 new tetrahedra... " <<finl;
00047     }
00048   else
00049     {
00050       Cerr << "we can not refine in dimension " << dimension <<finl;
00051       exit();
00052     }
00053   associer_domaine(is);
00054   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(domaine());
00055   for(int i=0; i<domaine().nb_zones() ; i++)
00056 
00057     {
00058       Raffiner_anisotrope_(domaine().zone(i));
00059     }
00060   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(domaine());
00061   Cerr << "Refinement... OK" << finl;
00062   return is;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void Raffiner_anisotrope::Raffiner_anisotrope_(Zone& zone)
00066 {
00067   if  ((zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Triangle")
00068        ||(zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Tetraedre"))
00069     {
00070       Domaine& dom=zone.domaine();
00071       IntTab& les_elems=zone.les_elems();
00072       int oldsz=les_elems.dimension(0);
00073       DoubleTab& sommets=dom.les_sommets();
00074       int cpt=sommets.dimension(0);
00075       {
00076         DoubleTab sommets_ajoutes(oldsz, dimension);
00077         zone.type_elem()->calculer_centres_gravite(sommets_ajoutes);
00078         sommets.resize(cpt+oldsz, dimension);
00079         for(int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00080           for(int j=0; j<dimension; j++)
00081             sommets(cpt+i,j)=sommets_ajoutes(i,j);
00082       }
00083 
00084       zone.typer(zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je());
00085       IntTab new_elems((dimension+1)*oldsz, dimension+1);
00086 
00087       if(dimension==2)
00088         {
00089           for(int i=0; i< oldsz; i++)
00090             {
00091               new_elems(i  , 0) = i+cpt;
00092               new_elems(i  , 1) = les_elems(i,0);
00093               new_elems(i  , 2) = les_elems(i,1);
00094 
00095               new_elems(i+oldsz, 0) = i+cpt;
00096               new_elems(i+oldsz, 1) = les_elems(i,0);
00097               new_elems(i+oldsz, 2) = les_elems(i,2);
00098 
00099               mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,i,i+oldsz,1);
00100 
00101               new_elems(i+2*oldsz, 0) = i+cpt;
00102               new_elems(i+2*oldsz, 1) = les_elems(i,1);
00103               new_elems(i+2*oldsz, 2) = les_elems(i,2);
00104 
00105               mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,i,i+2*oldsz,1);
00106             }
00107         }
00108       else
00109         {
00110           for(int i=0; i< oldsz; i++)
00111             {
00112               new_elems(i  , 0) = i+cpt;
00113               new_elems(i  , 1) = les_elems(i,0);
00114               new_elems(i  , 2) = les_elems(i,1);
00115               new_elems(i  , 3) = les_elems(i,2);
00116 
00117               new_elems(i+oldsz, 0) = i+cpt;
00118               new_elems(i+oldsz, 1) = les_elems(i,0);
00119               new_elems(i+oldsz, 2) = les_elems(i,1);
00120               new_elems(i+oldsz, 3) = les_elems(i,3);
00121 
00122               mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,i,i+oldsz,1);
00123 
00124               new_elems(i+2*oldsz, 0) = i+cpt;
00125               new_elems(i+2*oldsz, 1) = les_elems(i,0);
00126               new_elems(i+2*oldsz, 2) = les_elems(i,2);
00127               new_elems(i+2*oldsz, 3) = les_elems(i,3);
00128 
00129               mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,i,i+2*oldsz,1);
00130 
00131               new_elems(i+3*oldsz, 0) = i+cpt;
00132               new_elems(i+3*oldsz, 1) = les_elems(i,1);
00133               new_elems(i+3*oldsz, 2) = les_elems(i,2);
00134               new_elems(i+3*oldsz, 3) = les_elems(i,3);
00135 
00136               mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,i,i+3*oldsz,1);
00137             }
00138         }
00139 
00140       les_elems.ref(new_elems);
00141 
00142 // Reconstruction de l'octree
00143       if (dimension == 2)
00144         Cerr << "We have split the triangles ..." << finl;
00145       else
00146         Cerr << "We have split the tetrahedra ..." << finl;
00147       zone.invalide_octree();
00148 
00149       Cerr<<"END of Raffiner_anisotrope..."<<finl;
00150       Cerr<<"  1 NbElem="<<zone.les_elems().dimension(0)<<"  NbNod="<<zone.nb_som()<<finl;
00151     }
00152   else
00153     {
00154       Cerr << "We do not yet know how to Raffiner_anisotrope the "
00155            << zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() <<"s"<<finl;
00156       exit();
00157     }
00158 }
